name: JavaScript
title: A JavaScript cheat sheet with the most important concepts, functions, methods, and more. A complete quick reference for beginners.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A JavaScript cheat sheet with the most important concepts, functions, methods, and more. A complete quick reference for beginners.

cards.title: Introduction
cards.body:
JavaScript is a lightweight, interpreted programming language.

• [JSON cheatsheet](/json) _(cheatsheets.zip)_
• [Regex in JavaScript](/regex#regex-in-javascript) _(cheatsheets.zip)_

cards.title: Comments
cards.body:
```javascript
// This line will denote a comment

/*
The below configuration must be
changed before deployment.
*/
```

cards.title: Assignment Operators
let Keyword
const Keyword
Ternary Operator
Operators
cards.body:
```javascript
true || false; // true
10 > 5 || 10 > 20; // true
false || false; // false
10 > 100 || 10 > 20; // false
```

cards.title: Logical Operator &&
cards.body:
```javascript
true && true; // true
1 > 2 && 2 > 1; // false
true && false; // false
4 === 4 && 3 > 1; // true
```
